name.description: The 4 character ID of the vessel

serialNumber.description: Optional[The serial number of the vessel]

start.description: Optional[The start date and time of the vessel's usage]

end.description: Optional[The end date and time of the vessel's usage]

atdOffsets.description: The antenna transducer offset(s) for the vessel

serialNumber.description: The serial number of the transducer associated with the offset

type.description: The type of the IMU sensor

model.description: The model of the IMU sensor

serialNumber.description: Optional[The serial number of the IMU sensor]

start.description: The start date and time of the IMU sensor's usage

end.description: The end date and time of the IMU sensor's usage

gnssAntennas.description: The GNSS antennas on the vessel

type.description: The type of the GNSS antenna

model.description: The model of the GNSS antenna

serialNumber.description: Optional[The serial number of the GNSS antenna]

order.description: The order of the GNSS antenna

radomeSerialNumber.description: Optional[The serial number of the radome]

start.description: The start date and time of the GNSS antenna's usage

end.description: Optional[The end date and time of the GNSS antenna's usage]

gnssReceivers.description: The gnss receiver(s) on the vessel

type.description: The type of the GNSS receiver

model.description: The model of the GNSS receiver

serialNumber.description: The serial number of the GNSS receiver

firmwareVersion.description: The firmware version of the GNSS receiver

start.description: The start date and time of the firmware version's usage

end.description: The end date and time of the firmware version's usage

start.description: The start date and time of the GNSS receiver's usage

end.description: The end date and time of the GNSS receiver's usage

acousticTransducers.description: The acoustic transducer(s) on the vessel

type.description: The type of the acoustic transducer

serialNumber.description: Optional[The serial number of the acoustic transducer]

frequency.description: The frequency of the acoustic transducer

start.description: The start date and time of the acoustic transducer's usage

end.description: Optional[The end date and time of the acoustic transducer's usage]

acousticTransceivers.description: The acoustic transceiver(s) on the vessel

type.description: The type of the acoustic transceiver

serialNumber.description: Optional[The serial number of the acoustic transceiver]

frequency.description: The frequency of the acoustic transceiver

delayIncludedInTWTT.description: Whether the delay is included in the TWTT

start.description: The start date and time of the acoustic transceiver's usage

end.description: Optional[The end date and time of the acoustic transceiver's usage]
